items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: WG's Log Engine is a lightweight and efficient logging utility designed specifically for bot applications running on Node.js.
items.title: wgtechlabs/log-engine: WG's Log Engine is a lightweight and efficient logging utility designed specifically for bot applications running on Node.js.

items.content_html: Streamix is a lightweight reactive library that adopts known RxJS operators while using a simpler, generator-based approach for flexible and efficient data streams.
items.title: actioncrew/streamix: Streamix is a lightweight reactive library that adopts known RxJS operators while using a simpler, generator-based approach for flexible and efficient data streams.

items.content_html: CopyClip is a lightweight clipboard manager that helps you store and manage your copied text snippets efficiently. With an intuitive interface and quick access, it enhances productivity by keeping your clipboard history organized and easily accessible.
items.title: sifulbd/copyclip: CopyClip is a lightweight clipboard manager that helps you store and manage your copied text snippets efficiently. With an intuitive interface and quick access, it enhances productivity by keeping your clipboard history organized and easily accessible.

items.content_html: A lightweight, browser-based encrypted document vault. Upload, encrypt, and securely download text files — no backend required. Built with CryptoJS and JavaScript.
items.title: StackSurferDev/SecureVault: A lightweight, browser-based encrypted document vault. Upload, encrypt, and securely download text files — no backend required. Built with CryptoJS and JavaScript.

items.content_html: Logify is a lightweight, color-coded logging utility for Node.js and browser applications, supporting Persian date formatting.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript-based autocorrect system that uses Trie and edit-distance logic to suggest correct words from a dictionary.
items.title: Harsh-bharwani/AutoCorrect-Using-Trie-: A lightweight JavaScript-based autocorrect system that uses Trie and edit-distance logic to suggest correct words from a dictionary.

items.content_html: Authify is a lightweight authentication library designed for MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) applications. It provides an easy-to-use solution for implementing JWT-based authentication, user session management, and middleware integration to secure your APIs.
items.title: CloudDev777/MERN_JWT_authentication: Authify is a lightweight authentication library designed for MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) applications. It provides an easy-to-use solution for implementing JWT-based authentication, user session management, and middleware integration to secure your APIs.

items.title: arkitekk/ark-orm: Lightweight PostgreSQL ORM

items.content_html: A lightweight 2D open-world survival game starter kit using React, Vite, and SpacetimeDB. Designed for developers who want to build real-time multiplayer survival games with persistent world state, customizable characters, and rich crafting mechanics.
items.title: SeloSlav/vibe-coding-starter-pack-2d-multiplayer-survival: A lightweight 2D open-world survival game starter kit using React, Vite, and SpacetimeDB. Designed for developers who want to build real-time multiplayer survival games with persistent world state, customizable characters, and rich crafting mechanics.
